name: Harvest Dune
description:
Description

Made for Ludum Dare 52 Game Jam

Explore a strange and dangerous planet, where the valuable substance, melange spice, is worth more than life itself.

Use scouts to find spice to harvest, and defend yourself against raiders in the desert. Rumor has it there are even larger threats out there…

Controls

Steer with "A" & "D" or the left/right arrow keys

Commands can be made with buttons on the sidebar or with keys, described below:

  • Send a scout with "S", then left click
  • Place a turret with "T", then left click (costs 10mg of spice)
  • Call in an orbital cannon with "C", then left click (costs 50mg)
Development

Team: Reed, Naomi, & Rory

Programming: C# with VSCode and Vim

Art: Aseprite

Music: GarageBand

SFX: GarageBand

Developed in Unity v2021.3.16f1

Inspired by one of our favorite series ;)
